column1: Little Goat Diner////As someone new to Chicago
column2: I feel like I hit the jackpot finding this place and can't wait to introduce it to my friends.  For food
column3: I ordered the "This little piggy went to China" - every bite contained new and unexpected flavor explosions in the best way possible.  My friend ordered the biscuits and gravy
column4: which usually I find to be heavy and bland but here was rich in flavor as well.  Our waitress
column7: and we especially appreciated that she made sure to tell us that although she had a 25+ table just sitting down
column8: she would not forget about us.  As a brunch spot
column9: this place goes above and beyond.
